description:
As a merchant
  I want to add an order in backend
  If the payment/delivery method is not acceptable ,I will see error message
name: Should also block blacklist of payment/delivery in backend

elements.name: change the exclude payment of the product

steps.name: I am on Admin Login Page
I fill correct account email to email field
I fill correct account password to password field
I click on login button
I should see successful login
I check intercom message notification frame and click clear intercom message button
I check intercom message notification frame and click intercom message close button
I check new feature alert notification frame and click new feature alert close button
I check and click exclude products panel close button
I check and click no thanks button
I am on Orders Page
I select export dropdown option included 'Create Order' of export dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["","","","","","Create Order","Export Stock Picking List","Export Order Invoice","Export Order Report","Export Packing Slip"],"text":"Create Order"}

steps.name: I should be redirected to Orders Create Page
I click on select customer button
I should see select popover
I input email to search customer field
I click on 1st row of customer checkbox
I click on ok save button
I fill phone to phone number field
I click on save phone number checkbox
I click on next button
I click on select product button
I should see select popover
I input '15th Product for Checkout' to search product field
1st row of select product should contain '15th Product for Checkout'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"15th Product for Checkout","expectText":"15th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on 1st row of select product
I click on ok save button
row of product should contain '15th Product for Checkout'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"15th Product for Checkoutx NT$25 = NT$25Unlimited Quantity×","expectText":"15th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on product next button
I should see default null value
I select shipping destination dropdown option included 'Taiwan' of shipping destination dropdown
I wait for 3 seconds for loading
I select delivery method dropdown option included 'Custom Delivery' of delivery method dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["","(DBW) CustomDelivery","(DBW) - LocalDelivery","(DBW) 7-11 B2C - Pickup and pay in store","(DBW) 7-11 C2C - Pickup only","7-11 Pickup only (C2C)","7-11 Pickup only (B2C)","7-11 Pickup and pay in store (B2C)","Custom Delivery","7-11 Pickup and pay in store (C2C)","Local Delivery"],"text":"Custom Delivery"}

steps.name: I click on same as customer info checkbox
I click on delivery next button
I should see default null value
I select payment method dropdown option included 'Custom' of payment method dropdown
I switch to 2 of tabs
I am on Product Index Page
I input '15th Product for Checkout' to search field
1st row of product list should contain '15th Product for Checkout'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"NT$25 ∞ 15th Product for CheckoutUnpublishEdit","expectText":"15th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on 1st row of edit button
I should be redirected to Product Edit Page
I click on settings tab
I click on excluded payment collapse
I scroll down to excluded payment list
I click on row of excluded payment list included 'Custom'

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["Pay on Family Mart Store Pickup (C2C)","No Pay on 7-11 Return (C2B)","Pay on Family Mart Store Pickup (B2C)","Pay on 7-11 Store Pickup (B2C)","Pay on 7-11 Store Pickup (C2C)","Taishin","CVS via O'Pay","ATM via O'Pay","WebATM via O'Pay","Credit Card via O'Pay","Barcode via ECpay","CVS via ECpay","Credit Card via ECpay","LINE Pay","Pay on Store Pickup via ezShip","Custom","Cash on Delivery","Credit card or Paypal (Paypal Express)","Bank Transfer"],"text":"Custom"}

steps.name: I should see strikethrough
I click on 2nd update button
I should be redirected to Product Index Page
I should see alert
alert should contain 'Changes saved!'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"Changes saved!View 15th Product for Checkout in your store.","expectText":"Changes saved!"}

steps.name: I switch to 1 of tabs
I should be on Orders Create Page
I click on create order button
I wait for 3 seconds for loading
I should see error message frame
error message frame should contain error message

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"Selected payment or delivery method is not acceptable, please check setting or re-select it.","expectText":"Selected payment or delivery method is not acceptable, please check setting or re-select it."}

steps.name: I select payment method dropdown option included 'Cash on Delivery' of payment method dropdown
I click on language dropdown
I click on 2nd language dropdown option
I switch to 2 of tabs
I should be on Product Index Page
I input '15th Product for Checkout' to search field
1st row of product list should contain '15th Product for Checkout'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"NT$25 ∞ 15th Product for CheckoutUnpublishEdit","expectText":"15th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on 1st row of edit button
I should be redirected to Product Edit Page
I click on settings tab
I click on excluded payment collapse
I scroll down to excluded payment list
I click on row of excluded payment list included 'Cash on Delivery'

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["Pay on Family Mart Store Pickup (C2C)","No Pay on 7-11 Return (C2B)","Pay on Family Mart Store Pickup (B2C)","Pay on 7-11 Store Pickup (B2C)","Pay on 7-11 Store Pickup (C2C)","Taishin","CVS via O'Pay","ATM via O'Pay","WebATM via O'Pay","Credit Card via O'Pay","Barcode via ECpay","CVS via ECpay","Credit Card via ECpay","LINE Pay","Pay on Store Pickup via ezShip","Custom","Cash on Delivery","Credit card or Paypal (Paypal Express)","Bank Transfer"],"text":"Cash on Delivery"}

steps.name: I should see strikethrough
I click on 2nd update button
I should be redirected to Product Index Page
I should see alert
alert should contain 'Changes saved!'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"Changes saved!View 15th Product for Checkout in your store.","expectText":"Changes saved!"}

steps.name: I switch to 1 of tabs
I should be on Orders Create Page
I click on create order button
I wait for 3 seconds for loading
I should see error message frame
error message frame should contain chinese error message

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"訂單不適用選取的付款或送貨方式，請確認相關設定或重選。","expectText":"訂單不適用選取的付款或送貨方式，請確認相關設定或重選。"}

steps.name: ---ROLL BACK---
I click on language dropdown
I click on 1st language dropdown option
I switch to 2 of tabs
I am on Product Index Page
I input '15th Product for Checkout' to search field
1st row of product list should contain '15th Product for Checkout'
